text: Second lieutenant is an officer rank in the US Military. They are called commissioned officers, and are the lowest officer rank. == Branches == === U.S. Marine Corps, U.S. Army, U.S. Air Force, U.S. Space Force === In the Marine Corps, Army, Air Force, and Space Force, second lieutenants are junior officers. They command a group of around 20-50 soldiers, marines, airmen, or guardians. === U.S. Navy, U.S. Coast Guard === In the Navy and Coast Guard, Second Lieutenants are called Ensigns. == Pay == In 2024, second lieutenants are payed a minimum of 45'912 USD per year. == References == Category:Military of the United States Category:Military ranks
title: US Second Lieutenant
